actions.name: Trace
actions.description: Effect: The user replaces Trace with one ability the targeted creature knows until the user is switched out, gain @Affliction[fainted] or combat ends. If the targeted creature has more than one ability, the target chooses which ability the user copies.  [Legendary], [Innate], and [Forme Change] abilities cannot be copied.

system.description: Effect: The user replaces Trace with one ability the targeted creature knows until the user is switched out, gain @Affliction[fainted] or combat ends. If the targeted creature has more than one ability, the target chooses which ability the user copies.  [Legendary], [Innate], and [Forme Change] abilities cannot be copied.
